title: Treating Bee and Wasp Stings
brief: How to properly treat bee stings and reduce reaction symptoms.
steps: Immediately remove stinger and venom sac by scraping with fingernail or knife blade.
Do not squeeze or grasp the stinger or venom sac.
Wash sting site thoroughly with soap and water.
Apply cold compresses to reduce swelling and pain.
For itching relief, apply cooling paste of mud and ashes, dandelion sap, coconut meat, crushed garlic, or onion.
warnings: Never squeeze stinger or venom sac as this forces more venom into wound
Carry insect sting kit if known to be allergic to stings
Watch for signs of severe allergic reaction
